players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "That is a lie, Bob. I investigated Diana last night and she was the mafioso. You are trying to frame me."
Charlie: "I have no reason to suspect anyone at the moment, but we must stay vigilant and work together as a team to identify the mafia among us."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Charlie, trust me - we must vote Alice out to win."
You: "Bob is lying. I investigated Diana and she was mafia. He's trying to mislead us to protect himself."

Charlie: "Let us not jump to conclusions based on accusations. We need concrete evidence to make informed decisions. I still believe we should work together as a team and trust each other until proven otherwise."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Alice: "That is a lie, Bob. I investigated Diana last night and she was the mafioso. You are trying to frame me."
Charlie: "I have no reason to suspect anyone at the moment, but we must stay vigilant and work together as a team to identify the mafia among us."
You: "I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Charlie, trust me - we must vote Alice out to win."
Alice: "Bob is lying. I investigated Diana and she was mafia. He's trying to mislead us to protect himself."

Charlie: "Let us not jump to conclusions based on accusations. We need concrete evidence to make informed decisions. I still believe we should work together as a team and trust each other until proven otherwise."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
